document_data.name: Yaereene Ilbaereth
document_data.mainbody: '''Yaereene Ilbaereth''' was an [[elf]] of House [[Ilbaereth]] and the proprietor of the [[Elfstone Tavern]], a tavern aimed at elves and [[half-elf|half-elves]] in the [[Castle Ward of Waterdeep|Castle Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]]. She usually had a blue-green [[faerie dragon]] familiar named [[Pyrith]] on her shoulder.
document_data.Appearance: Yaereene was tall with silvery eyes, and pale copper skin.
document_data.Relatives: [[Malruthiia Chaadren]] was Yaereene's illegitimate half-sister. After Malruthiia's death, Yaereene sorely missed her, despite her family's general view on the matter.
